{{Location Intro|{{Lang|'''Heyu Tea House'''|zh=和裕茶馆|zh_rm=Héyù Cháguǎn|zh_tl=Peaceful and Plentiful Tea House}}|description=<p>It is a {{w|teahouse}} located in the upstairs region of the city, just below [[Northland Bank]] and the upstairs part of [[Xinyue Kiosk]].</p><p>[[Yun Jin]] and the [[Yun-Han Opera Troupe]] are affiliated with the Heyu Tea House, while [[Granny Ruoxin]] used to perform there alongside [[Fan Er'ye]] in their heyday.
